data.text: @dugsir56 Oh my friend so sorry you’re going through this but I’m glad they kept u overnight to make sure you’re okay. Hope your BP remains stable, do u normally run low? know what u don’t have to tell me it’s just my nurse brain kicks in lol. I’ll check on u later today, love & hugs💗🤗

@AlishaBlue22 They don’t have my IVs hooked up but they still in my arms so it gave me freedom to walk around in my room so I carefully rearranged things where I could sit at my window and my BP went from 79/56 to 108/72. If my BP hadn’t been so low they might have released me today. https://t.co/n1sVwP4vXW

@dugsir56 You’re so welcome and thank goodness they didn’t take your phone. The rose is beautiful, I luv the pic does look like it’s outside.🌹
I thought u we’re going to b discharged today? Is everything alright?

@AlishaBlue22 Thank you so much my dear sweet friend. I may be trapped in a small room but they didn’t take away my iPhone and charger and a kind friend ordered me a rose and some fun with it making it look we was both outside https://t.co/5g3Jbjs1Fs

@FusuAna Thank you so much my dear friend. That was very nice. I listened to 3 and just kept getting better each time. The video was awesome too. I wish could have been good at golf ⛳️ but I had problems with a slice and my best score ever was 80. I came so to breaking into the 70s. https://t.co/QFrp8VGUJu
@dugsir56 Beautiful butterflies and thank you for posting.  Feel better soon.
@dugsir56 Congratulations darling! Here is a new soothing melody of mine and video to soothe you. https://t.co/cDzHlrIxKk

@dugsir56 Dawn I’m so sorry you’re in the hospital. I’ve been working my last shifts so I haven’t been on Twitter as much this past week. 😞

Hope they’re taking good care of you. My DMs are always open if u want to chat. Love ya💗🙏 https://t.co/MaH138D5C2
@dugsir56 👏👏👏👏👏👏👏rest at home is always so much better.
